text: @realDonaldTrump JFC. Allow me to explain why your priming argument in preparation for your defeat is ill thought out... WWI and WWII were fought in Europe and the Pacific. COVID-19 is in the United States. See why mail-in voting (which you've done personally) is on the table you incapable POS?
